### Pre-Release Checklist
- [ ] Code is linted with no errors (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] main.js, manifest.json, and styles.css are up to date
- [ ] Version numbers match across manifest.json, package.json, and versions.json
- [ ] All hotkeys function correctly
- [ ] Plugin works on desktop
- [ ] Plugin works on mobile
- [ ] Settings can be saved and loaded properly
- [ ] No console errors
